repairedDockerfile:
FROM debian:jessie 

MAINTAINER dario dario@dariozanzico.com 

RUN \
 apt-get update && \
 apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y openssl heirloom-mailx && \
rm -fr /var/lib/apt/lists/*

COPY files/ssl-cert-check-v3.29 /ssl-cert-check 
COPY files/run.sh /run.sh 
COPY files/mailrc.template /tmp/ 

RUN chmod +x /ssl-cert-check 
RUN chmod +x /run.sh 

CMD /run.sh
